channel.title: climate emergency on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in climate emergency on ERIC WANG

item.title: @FREELANCE - How to deal with the preparation of a seminary at COP21 after a dreadful event ?
item.description: What a great mission to work for the preparation of a seminar at COP21 for CNRS - national scientific research center.

item.title: @CARBONE 4 - How to price carbone ?
item.description: After graduation, I have joined a consulting firm Carbone 4, specialised in climate change strategy. One of the three mission is carbon price and its strategic involvement for future law appliance.

item.title: @MAYOR OF PARIS - How do we access water in Paris ?
item.description: Feasibility study for water access in Paris to quantify the correct need. The townhall of paris is working to decrease the feeling of heat (cf. urbain heat island phenomena).
